ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): if widget.ProviderWidget == None: return
cliente = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity
if cliente == None: return
widget.Hidden = not cliente.VisibilidadeDirfBeneficiarioResidenteExterior
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = Utils.VerificaPermissao("MANTERFORNECEDOR", "MODULO_CONTRATOS", "MANTER_CLIENTES", "MODULO_COMERCIAL", "MODULO_FINANCEIRO", "MODULO_TRIBUTOS")
